name: Chess Brain: Dark Troops
description:
Chess Brain: Dark Troops
One of the purposes of this game is to develop the ability to predict movement in Chess, using a playful and immersive concept.

The dark troops march in a single sound
They are more organized and smarter

The King must reach the destination.
Draw the correct path and don't let it get killed by the opposite pieces!
Every second all the pieces move!

Solve 30 puzzles!

The correct path will take you to the destination point!

Introducing a new troop, the Red Soldier

The Red Soldier has a brain
